title: errore MOZILLA_PKIX_ERROR_OCSP_RESPONSE_FOR_CERT_MISSING tentanto di accedere a siti microsoft
content: ogni volta che prova ad accedere allo store xbox o altri siti microsoft ottengo questo messaggio d'errore MOZILLA_PKIX_ERROR_OCSP_RESPONSE_FOR_CERT_MISSING ho contattato anche la loro assistenza e mi hanno detto che è un bug del vostro browser che funzionava benissimo prima dell'ultimo aggiornamento rilasciato ho provato a svuotare cache ed eliminare cronologia e cookies ma non è servito a nulla.

title: Can't type comments on Facebook
content: I'm using v56.0.2 as it was the last before Mozilla took away the extensions that I depend on. Up until recently, it's worked flawlessly on Facebook. Now, within the last week or so, I can no longer type in the comments box on someone else's post. The cursor is there and flashing but when I type, the cursor only flickers but no text. Other browsers don't have this issue so I'm confident that it's nothing to do with my FB profile. Typing in the search box or creating a new post works fine. I just can't type comments.

title: Restore Previous Session after clicking the button when I shouldn't have thereby wiping it
content: I lost 300ish tabs because I clicked the "restore previous session" button a few seconds before I got the final confirmation that my internet was activated because I was impatient. Following various other similar questions, I've used ShadowExplorer to grab the previous.jsonlz4, recovery.baklz4, and recovery.jsonlz4 and through the use of https://www.jeffersonscher.com/ffu/scrounger.html I have confirmed that they are the correct browsing session or are close enough. I cannot get Firefox to use these files when they're in the Users/Name/AppData/Roaming/Mozilla/Firefox/Profiles/string of characters.default-release folder (renaming the current iterations to replace them & even removing them from the folder didn't work, it still restored my session of looking up how to restore the session before that one), and I'm worried that it's because they aren't complete sine the scrounging tool eventually stops showing characters in its display (instead it's four zero's arranged in a square) and it can't identify beyond the first 5 tabs. There weren't any truly important tabs open, mostly stuff that I came across by chance that I thought I'd look at sooner than I did and will be difficult to find again and a backlog from various YouTubers I'm subscribed to because I hate "watch later". Is there anything I can do, or should I just give up on restoring this session?
creator: SomeInternetPerson

title: How Prevent Firefox Screen Dimmer?
content:
The exact version doesn't matter, but I am using Firefox v. 95.0 (64 bit). Earlier, recent versions had the same problem. I am using Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS.

When I click to select one of many available choices, Firefox often automatically dims the screen. If I stop typing, the screen is slowly returned to its normal, bright state. I can keep working with the dimmed screen, but it is very aggravating and error-prone.

An example is at https://species.wikimedia.org/wiki/Zyras, which gives numerous choice selections. Try quickly selecting and then exitting several nearby choices.

I can speed up the return of brightness by using a shell window to run "xrandr --output HDMI-1 --brightness 1.00; xset s noblank; xset s off; xset -dpms" and then quickly selecting (in my LG Settings/Displays window) "Fractional Scaling" scale OFF (100%) and then ON (100% vs "125% 150% 175% 200%") several (up to 30) times.

HOW DO I COMPLETELY TURN OFF THE FIREFOX SCREEN DIMMER?
creator: jwill1000000

title: Bloqueo funcionammiento correo electrónico
content:
Hoy (por primera vez en años) no he podido recibir ni enviar nada desde mi cuenta Gmail en Firefox pues sale el siguiente mensaje de error que me tiene bloqueado el correo electrónico: "El envío de la contraseña no se completó con éxito. El servidor de correo pop.googlemail.com respondió: Application-specific passwod required: https//suport.google.com/accounts/answer 185833". Puesto en contacto con el servicio técnico de Google me informan que, en este caso, se trata de un asunto que Firefox tiene que solucionar. (Y es verdad que mi cuenta de Gmail, en Chrome, funciona sin novedad). Les ruego solucionen mi problema o me digan cómo solucionarlo.


Gracias y saludos cordiales

title: How to fix popup going to desktop
